skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the fourth ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Pola. My sisters and I have stronger armor rarely seen on heavy cruisers, which gives us an advantage in artillery battles. In terms of my abilities to serve as flagship... I might be a bit more suitable than Zara?
skins.acquisition: I'm Pola, heavy cruiser from Sardegna. And you're the commander of this fleet? I see. Well, don't let me down, okay? Hehe~
skins.login: Hehe, you sure took your sweet time. The fleet exercises are about to start without you~
skins.details: My Zara is always so gentle and lovely, I just can't take my eyes off her.
skins.secretaryIdle1: All these "conventions" and "treaties"... Things that do not consider the feelings of actual people should disappear from this world.
skins.secretaryIdle2: A true fighter does not fear any danger. I won't back down even in the face of a heavy storm.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The feeling of being enveloped by a searchlight... makes me a bit uneasy.
skins.secretaryTouch: My rapier is not simply for show, you know.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You surely didn't do the same kind of stuff to Zara, right?
